price: No mu bantu ba Musa harimo itsinda riyobora (abantu) rikoresheje ukuri, rikanagukoresha mu butabera.
arabic: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamin qawmi mūsā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
